thread.title: Nigeria: Walmart Set to Operate in Lagos

title: Nigeria: Walmart Set to Operate in Lagos
text:
Cameroon: Cameroon Pays High Price for Joining Boko Haram Fight 
Receiving the delegation, Ambode said the presence of the brand in Lagos would go a long way not only in creating jobs but also boosting the economy of the state. 
He added that his administration was ready to give the necessary support to the organisation to establish its presence in Lagos. Nigeria
